Title: Aaron Brownstein Must Be Stopped
Writer: Jason Katims (developed by), Jessica Goldberg, Lowell Ganz (based on the characters created by), Babaloo Mandel (based on the characters created by), Ron Howard (based on the characters created by)
Actors: Peter Krause, Lauren Graham, Dax Shepard, Monica Potter
Plot: Max experiences his first heartbreak after he catches Dylan kissing another boy; Amber reaches an unexpected stage in her pregnancy; and Hank discovers Ruby threw a party at her mom's house while she was home alone.
